sn36.11:1.1: Atha kho aññataro bhikkhu yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi. Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho so bhikkhu bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
sn36.11:1.2: “idha mayhaṁ, bhante, rahogatassa paṭisallīnassa evaṁ cetaso parivitakko udapādi—
sn36.11:1.4: Sukhā vedanā, dukkhā vedanā, adukkhamasukhā vedanā—
sn36.11:1.8: Kiṁ nu kho etaṁ bhagavatā sandhāya bhāsitaṁ:
sn36.11:2.2: Tisso imā, bhikkhu, vedanā vuttā mayā.
sn36.11:2.3: Sukhā vedanā, dukkhā vedanā, adukkhamasukhā vedanā—
sn36.11:2.7: Taṁ kho panetaṁ, bhikkhu, mayā saṅkhārānaṁyeva aniccataṁ sandhāya bhāsitaṁ:
sn36.11:2.9: Taṁ kho panetaṁ, bhikkhu, mayā saṅkhārānaṁyeva khayadhammataṁ …pe…
sn36.11:2.15: Atha kho pana, bhikkhu, mayā anupubbasaṅkhārānaṁ nirodho akkhāto.
sn36.11:2.16: Paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ samāpannassa vācā niruddhā hoti.
sn36.11:2.17: Dutiyaṁ jhānaṁ samāpannassa vitakkavicārā niruddhā honti.
sn36.11:2.18: Tatiyaṁ jhānaṁ samāpannassa pīti niruddhā hoti.
sn36.11:2.19: Catutthaṁ jhānaṁ samāpannassa assāsapassāsā niruddhā honti.
sn36.11:2.24: Saññāvedayitanirodhaṁ samāpannassa saññā ca vedanā ca niruddhā honti.
sn36.11:2.25: Khīṇāsavassa bhikkhuno rāgo niruddho hoti, doso niruddho hoti, moho niruddho hoti.
sn36.11:2.26: Atha kho, bhikkhu, mayā anupubbasaṅkhārānaṁ vūpasamo akkhāto.
sn36.11:2.27: Paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ samāpannassa vācā vūpasantā hoti.
sn36.11:2.28: Dutiyaṁ jhānaṁ samāpannassa vitakkavicārā vūpasantā honti …pe…
sn36.11:2.29: saññāvedayitanirodhaṁ samāpannassa saññā ca vedanā ca vūpasantā honti.
sn36.11:2.30: Khīṇāsavassa bhikkhuno rāgo vūpasanto hoti, doso vūpasanto hoti, moho vūpasanto hoti.
sn36.11:2.32: Paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ samāpannassa vācā paṭippassaddhā hoti.
sn36.11:2.33: Dutiyaṁ jhānaṁ samāpannassa vitakkavicārā paṭippassaddhā honti.
sn36.11:2.34: Tatiyaṁ jhānaṁ samāpannassa pīti paṭippassaddhā hoti.
sn36.11:2.35: Catutthaṁ jhānaṁ samāpannassa assāsapassāsā paṭippassaddhā honti.
sn36.11:2.36: Saññāvedayitanirodhaṁ samāpannassa saññā ca vedanā ca paṭippassaddhā honti.
sn36.11:2.37: Khīṇāsavassa bhikkhuno rāgo paṭippassaddho hoti, doso paṭippassaddho hoti, moho paṭippassaddho hotī”ti.
